title: Pesticides: friend or foe?
creator_credit: South Australian Film Corporation, Bruce Moir and Ron Saunders
brief_description: Shows the need for great care in the preparation and use of pesticides. A home gardener and a farmer each make many mistakes when spraying. Shows the mistakes, the dangerous results and the correct procedures.
creator_credit_for_label: South Australian Film Corporation, Bruce Moir and Ron Saunders
